segue_the_chain: From Christmas to another Christmas-related song…

segue_dave.line: The Blue Nile started being a band in 1981, while Siouxsie and the Banshees's "Spellbound" was released in the same year...
segue_dave.explanation: The Blue Nile started being a band in 1981 and Siouxsie and the Banshees's "Juju" was released in the same year.
